title: THE ADMIRAL WAS A LADY video quality upgrade

sources.title: THE ADMIRAL WAS A LADY video quality upgrade
sources.description: This glitch-free print isn't perfect, however it is a noticable improvement over the existing IA copy. A screwball romantic comedy set among recently discharged WW2 vets, costarring Edmond O'Brien and Wanda Hendrix with a good supporting cast. High energy hijinks that flopped at the box office, but gained new life when in the mid-fifties it was screened on the CBS network's "Late Show" and "Late, Late Show." After which it was picked up by independent TV stations and screened to death. Produced & directed by Albert S. Rogell Released in 1950 Complete print
